Package hr.fer.zemris.webapps.webapp2

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BgColorFilter
    Filters all requests and sets session attribute for background color if none is set.
    PieChartUtil
    Utility class for creating pie charts and images of the charts using JFreeChart.
    PowersServlet
    Dynamically creates a Microsoft Excel (XLS) document with n pages.
    Page i contains a table with two columns, first column has values from interval [a, b] and second their respective i-th powers.
    Parameters n, a, b are expected to be received as a part of the URL.
    ReportImageServlet
    Creates a PNG image containing a pie chart with data about usage of different operating systems from a survey.
    SetBgColorServlet
    Sets the background color for the whole web-application to the color it received in the parameter color.
    StartTimeListener
    This ServletContextListener just sets the current time, at the moment of initialization, into ServletContext's attributes.
    TrigonometricServlet
    Creates a table with sine and cosine values for all angles in interval [a,b] where a and b are URL parameters.
    TrigonometricServlet.TrigValues
    Encapsulation of sine and cosine values for an angle.
